name: StarCraft Reawakening
author: zarxiel93
description:
![Image of SC1 units official artwork](https://cdn0.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/osT9UKgAVkYf1HVPvnkDPhP-qwk=/100x0:1180x720/1200x800/filters:focal(100x0:1180x720)/cdn0.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_image/image/10638545/starcraft-15th-anniversary-wallpaper_1280.0.jpg)

 

SCRTGW started as the Italian Localization of Mass Recall and then splitted from it to become a separated project (while keeping MR mods and most of its maps as teamplates).

 

We spent a lot of time on completely overhauling terrains and updating cutscenes plus lore elements to keep up with the current StarCraft lore, with characters, units and other elements coming from the SC Novels/Books/Digital Comics and StarCraft 2 itself.

We also pay maniacal attention to models, with high quality assets coming from the best Model Makers on sc2mapster ([DaveTheSpectre](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/davethespectre), [Alleyviper85](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/alleyviper85), [miazmatic, ](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/miazmatic)[Solstice245](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/solstice245), [HammerTheTank107](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/hammerthetank107),  [_ForgeUser7364532](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/_ForgeUser7364532) and[ ](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/miazmatic)[ghostnova91](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/ghostnova91) just to name a few of them).

We also added SC1 Cinematics, SC2 Cinematics (Only the "Betrayal" one) and remade in-game all of StarCraft Remastered pre-mission artwork recaps.

We even had a lore clarification by Phill Gonzales (the one that made most of sc2 wol/hots models) about Void Rays (yeah Zarxiel, wanted to put Void Rays smh...).

 

***DefilerRulez* Playthrough **[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYggf1KSz7WbjNwrfb8vvTCQwHa5OxFjP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYggf1KSz7WbjNwrfb8vvTCQwHa5OxFjP)

**-Necessary files-**

NOTE: Download Mods and Launcher files of the italian version since they also support the english version.

**[Mods for english units quotes ](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/starcraft-reawakening/files/3399580)**(new version 24 July 2021)

 

**DLCs**

**[Loomings ](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/starcraft-reawakening/files/3778335)[ ](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/starcraft-reawakening/files/2573294)**(new version 03 May 2022)

**[Loomings (italian sub) ](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/starcraft-reawakening/files/3778321)**(new version 03 May 2022)

**[Enslavers ](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/starcraft-reawakening/files/3778378)**(new version 03 May 2022)

[**Dark Vengeance**](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/starcraft-reawakening/files/3778460) (new version 03 May 2022)

[**Stukov Saga**](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/starcraft-reawakening/files/3778473)(new version 03 May 2022)

 

![](https://scontent.fgig3-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/22046112_769798116536401_6130977254001759255_n.jpg?oh=5b7d04d0ed35d63be9608341135d1c7f&oe=5A47CD18)We'll keep new and updated models coming.

Only Italian and English localizations are available, if there's anyone interested on translating other langueges, feel free to contact us.

 

This mod is based on the Mass Recall mod and Maps (Except Enslavers DV and Deception).

 

Hope you'll all enjoy our SCRTGW and have fun :)
